remarks: Rule used to change the third bound variable in an operation abstraction, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2004.)  (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
statement:
cbvoprab3v.1 $e |- ( z = w -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvoprab3v $p |- { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ph } = { <. <. x , y >. , w >. | ps } $.
$d ph w $.
$d ps z $.
$d w x z $.
$d w y z $.
